info.name: OpsCore API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for OpsCore Logistics Management System. Import this collection and set the baseUrl variable. All endpoints support JWT authentication via Bearer token.

query.description: Optional: Filter by status (CREATED, ASSIGNED, APPROVED, IN_TRANSIT, DELIVERED, CANCEL_BY_CUSTOMER, CANCEL_BY_DRIVER)

request.description:
Get all shipments for the authenticated tenant. Admin sees all shipments, Driver sees only assigned shipments. Optional status filter available.

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "shipment-123",
      "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
      "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
      "customerName": "John Doe",
      "customerPhone": "+1234567890",
      "status": "CREATED",
      "driverId": null,
      "pendingApproval": false,
      "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
      "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "shipment-456",
      "pickupAddress": "789 Broadway, Manhattan, NY 10003",
      "deliveryAddress": "321 Park Ave, Queens, NY 11101",
      "customerName": "Jane Smith",
      "customerPhone": "+1987654321",
      "status": "IN_TRANSIT",
      "driverId": "driver-789",
      "pendingApproval": false,
      "createdAt": "2024-01-15T09:00:00Z",
      "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T11:30:00Z"
    }
  ]
}
```

Get detailed information about a specific shipment. Admin can view any shipment, Driver can only view assigned shipments.

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "shipment-123",
    "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
    "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
    "customerName": "John Doe",
    "customerPhone": "+1234567890",
    "status": "APPROVED",
    "driverId": "driver-789",
    "pendingApproval": false,
    "assignedAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:35:00Z"
  }
}
```

header.description: Idempotency key for duplicate request prevention

request.description:
Create a new shipment. Admin only. Idempotency-Key header ensures duplicate requests return the same response.

**Example Request:**
```json
{
  "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
  "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
  "customerName": "John Doe",
  "customerPhone": "+1234567890"
}
```

**Example Response (201):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "shipment-123",
    "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
    "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
    "customerName": "John Doe",
    "customerPhone": "+1234567890",
    "status": "CREATED",
    "driverId": null,
    "pendingApproval": false,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

Assign a driver to a shipment. Admin only. Changes status from CREATED to ASSIGNED and sets pendingApproval to true.

**Example Request:**
```json
{
  "driverId": "driver-789"
}
```

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "shipment-123",
    "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
    "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
    "customerName": "John Doe",
    "customerPhone": "+1234567890",
    "status": "ASSIGNED",
    "driverId": "driver-789",
    "pendingApproval": true,
    "assignedAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z"
  }
}
```

Driver approves shipment assignment. Changes status from ASSIGNED to APPROVED and starts route simulation Phase 1 (TO_PICKUP). Driver only.

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "shipment-123",
    "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
    "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
    "customerName": "John Doe",
    "customerPhone": "+1234567890",
    "status": "APPROVED",
    "driverId": "driver-789",
    "pendingApproval": false,
    "assignedAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:35:00Z"
  }
}
```

Driver rejects shipment assignment. Changes status from ASSIGNED back to CREATED and removes driver assignment. Driver only.

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "shipment-123",
    "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
    "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
    "customerName": "John Doe",
    "customerPhone": "+1234567890",
    "status": "CREATED",
    "driverId": null,
    "pendingApproval": false,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:40:00Z"
  }
}
```

Update shipment status to IN_TRANSIT. Valid transition: APPROVED → IN_TRANSIT. Triggers route simulation Phase 2 (TO_DELIVERY). Admin or Driver.

**Example Request:**
```json
{
  "status": "IN_TRANSIT"
}
```

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "shipment-123",
    "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
    "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
    "customerName": "John Doe",
    "customerPhone": "+1234567890",
    "status": "IN_TRANSIT",
    "driverId": "driver-789",
    "pendingApproval": false,
    "assignedAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T11:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

**Example Request:**
```json
{
  "status": "DELIVERED"
}
```

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "shipment-123",
    "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
    "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
    "customerName": "John Doe",
    "customerPhone": "+1234567890",
    "status": "DELIVERED",
    "driverId": "driver-789",
    "pendingApproval": false,
    "assignedAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T12:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

Customer cancels a shipment. Changes status to CANCEL_BY_CUSTOMER. Only allowed before IN_TRANSIT. Customer only.

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "shipment-123",
    "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
    "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
    "customerName": "John Doe",
    "customerPhone": "+1234567890",
    "status": "CANCEL_BY_CUSTOMER",
    "driverId": null,
    "pendingApproval": false,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:45:00Z"
  }
}
```

Driver cancels a shipment. Changes status to CANCEL_BY_DRIVER. Only allowed before IN_TRANSIT. Driver only (must be assigned driver).

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "shipment-123",
    "pickupAddress": "123 Main St, New York, NY 10001",
    "deliveryAddress": "456 Oak Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11201",
    "customerName": "John Doe",
    "customerPhone": "+1234567890",
    "status": "CANCEL_BY_DRIVER",
    "driverId": null,
    "pendingApproval": false,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:50:00Z"
  }
}
```

Get all active drivers for the authenticated tenant with their current locations. Admin or Driver.

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [
    {
      "id": "driver-789",
      "name": "John Driver",
      "phone": "+1234567890",
      "licenseNumber": "DL123456",
      "vehicleType": "TRUCK",
      "isActive": true,
      "location": {
        "latitude": 40.7128,
        "longitude": -74.0060,
        "timestamp": "2024-01-15T11:00:00Z",
        "source": "REST"
      },
      "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
      "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T11:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": "driver-456",
      "name": "Jane Driver",
      "phone": "+1987654321",
      "licenseNumber": "DL789012",
      "vehicleType": "VAN",
      "isActive": true,
      "location": null,
      "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
      "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z"
    }
  ]
}
```

Get detailed information about a specific driver including current location. Admin or Driver (drivers can only view their own details).

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "driver-789",
    "name": "John Driver",
    "phone": "+1234567890",
    "licenseNumber": "DL123456",
    "vehicleType": "TRUCK",
    "isActive": true,
    "location": {
      "latitude": 40.7128,
      "longitude": -74.0060,
      "timestamp": "2024-01-15T11:00:00Z",
      "source": "SIMULATED"
    },
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T11:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

Update driver location via REST API. Location is stored in Redis and broadcast via Socket.IO. Admin or Driver (drivers can only update their own location). Alternative: Use MQTT topic tenant/{tenantId}/driver/{driverId}/location

**Example Request:**
```json
{
  "latitude": 40.7128,
  "longitude": -74.0060,
  "timestamp": "2024-01-15T11:00:00Z"
}
```

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Location updated successfully"
}
```

**Note:** If route simulation is active, real GPS updates will be blocked to prevent interference with simulated movement.

Get real-time operational dashboard summary. Uses CQRS read model for performance. Returns totalShipments, activeShipments, deliveredToday, driversOnline, and lastUpdated. All authenticated users.

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "totalShipments": 150,
    "activeShipments": 25,
    "deliveredToday": 12,
    "driversOnline": 8,
    "lastUpdated": "2024-01-15T11:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

query.description: Number of notifications to return (default: 50, max: 100)

request.description:
Mark a specific notification as read. Returns the updated notification with status READ. All authenticated users (can only mark own notifications).

**Example Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "notif-123",
    "userId": "user-456",
    "type": "SHIPMENT_ASSIGNED",
    "title": "New Shipment Assignment",
    "message": "You have been assigned to shipment shipment-123",
    "status": "READ",
    "metadata": {
      "shipmentId": "shipment-123",
      "driverId": "driver-789"
    },
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "readAt": "2024-01-15T11:00:00Z"
  }
}
```
